name: GRCI for HERETIC version 1 (GRCIH1.WAD)
description: Single level replacement for map E1M1 in HERETIC. : Approximation of parking garage and courtyard of : the GRCI building in Vienna Virginia, USA. Plays : best as Deathmatch WAD, especially with 4 players. : Small, but with spots to hide, for a little while. : Consistent use of texture and lighting. Monster : placement a bit arbitrary, just mop them up and : start looking for the Most Dangerous Game.
